name: mcp-s3
description: MCP server for Amazon S3 and S3-compatible object storage. Enables AI assistants to list buckets, browse objects, and read/write files in S3, MinIO, SeaweedFS, and other compatible storage systems.

tools.name: s3_list_objects
tools.description: List objects with prefix, delimiter, and pagination support

tools.name: s3_get_object_metadata
tools.description: Get object metadata without downloading content (HEAD request)

tools.name: s3_put_object
tools.description: Upload object to S3 (blocked by default in read-only mode)

tools.name: s3_delete_object
tools.description: Delete object from S3 (blocked by default in read-only mode)

tools.name: s3_copy_object
tools.description: Copy object within or between buckets

tools.name: s3_presign_url
tools.description: Generate presigned GET or PUT URLs
